mapper.insert: insert into CARREG ( brand, carType, color, photo, manufacturedDay, mileage, warranty, options, description, price, sold) values (#{brand}, #{carType}, #{color}, #{photo}, #{manufacturedDay}, #{mileage}, #{warranty}, #{options}, #{description}, #{price}, #{sold})
mapper.update: update CARREG set brand=#{brand}, carType=#{carType}, color=#{color}, photo=#{photo}, manufacturedDay=#{manufacturedDay},mileage=#{mileage}, warranty=#{warranty}, options=#{options}, description=#{description}, price=#{price}, sold=#{sold} where carid=#{carid}
mapper.select: select * from CARREG order by carid desc
